solution_line_template: In the first verse, {total_singers} / {first_verse_divisor} = <<{total_singers}/{first_verse_divisor}={singers_first_verse}>>{singers_first_verse} singers sang.
In the second verse, {remaining_after_first_verse} / {second_verse_divisor} = <<{remaining_after_first_verse}/{second_verse_divisor}={singers_second_verse}>>{singers_second_verse} singers joined in.

In the final verse, {total_singers} - {singers_first_verse} - {singers_second_verse} = <<{total_singers}-{singers_first_verse}-{singers_second_verse}={singers_third_verse}>>{singers_third_verse} singers joined for the whole choir to sing together.
